mapper.sql: id, problem_square_name, problem_square_description, attention_num, owner_id, problem_square_icon, message_num, build_time
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from problem_square
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into problem_square (id, problem_square_name, problem_square_description, attention_num, owner_id, problem_square_icon, message_num, build_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{problemSquareName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{problemSquareDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attentionNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ownerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{problemSquareIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{messageNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{buildTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.select:
select
from problem_square order by build_time LIMIT #{beginNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sizeNum,jdbcType=INTEGER};

select
from problem_square where problem_square_name LIKE %#{condition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}% or problem_square_description LIKE %#{condition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}% order by build_time LIMIT #{beginNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sizeNum,jdbcType=INTEGER};
